title: LOOKING FOR I2G/P TEAM. SUP AND TOP FILLED.
body:
LOOKING FOR A TEAM TO PLAY IN BATTLEFY TOURNAMENTS WITH. 

IDEALLY MIN GOLD PLAYERS AS WE ARE HAVING A BAD EXPERIENCE WITH LOWER RANKED PLAYERS. 
WE ARE HAPPY TO PLAY IN A NEW TEAM OR CREATE A NEW ONE.

{{item:2050}} 

WE CAN ADJUST POSITIONS IF NEEDED BUT WE MAIN SUP AND TOP.

 GOOD MICS AND NET REQUIRED AND BE AVAILABLE MOST DAYS AFTER 5PM.

COMMENT IGN AND OP.GG PROFILE BELOW IF INTERESTED!
